div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 630 Merisanii, c. 20 km. NE of Alexandria, Rumania, 1961 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. Contents: 14+ AR. Pot hoard Macedonia, 1st Region: 10 tetradr. Thasos: 4 spread-flan tetradr. incl. 2 imit. Disposition: Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) 14 Preda, SCIV 1966, pp. 372-3
